thread.title: Piggie the echidna returned safe and well to Currumbin Sanctuary, man charged with theft |
thread.title_full: Piggie the echidna returned safe and well to Currumbin Sanctuary, man charged with theft | The Courier-Mail

author: couriermail.com.au
title: Piggie the echidna returned safe and well to Currumbin Sanctuary, man charged with theft |
text:
Piggie the echidna was taken from her enclosure by two men on Saturday, caught on CCTV cameras.
A QPS spokesman said Piggie was found within the perimeter fence and it is believed someone has returned her.
A 24-year-old man was charged this morning with receiving tainted property and animal cruelty.
He is due to appear in Southport Magistrates Court today.
Investigations are continuing.
